minecraft:written_book_content.title: The Hamster Life
minecraft:written_book_content.author: The Scarlet Fox
pages:
{"extra":[{"text":"The Hamster Life","color":"gold","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"

So, you want hamsters?

An admirable, if slightly predictable, goal.

This guide contains dubious wisdom gleaned from watching small rodents. Use at your own risk.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"Getting Started","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\n\nFirst, you need bait. The good stuff comes from ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Cucumbers","color":"dark_green"},{"text":". Find ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Wild Cucumber Bushes","color":"dark_green"},{"text":" in warmer places - plains, savannas, maybe jungle edges. Right-click 'em for seeds.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"Harvesting Notes","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"

","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Sunflowers","color":"gold"},{"text":" sometimes yield seeds on right-click. They regrow eventually.
If one seems barren, it might just be an old chunk - try finding one in an area you haven't explored.

","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Wild Bushes","color":"dark_green"},{"text":" drop farmable seeds too.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"SPOILER WARNING","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\n\nBeyond this page lie spoilers. If you prefer blissful ignorance, turn back now. Or don't. I'm a book, not your conscience.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"Feeding: Breeding","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\n\nIf its healthy, the same basic food might trigger... ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Love Mode","color":"light_purple"},{"text":". Find another hamster also in Love Mode. Stand back. Nature happens.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"Hamster Haute Couture","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\n\nStumbled upon some ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Pink Petals","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"? Try right-clicking your hamster with them. It's called fashion, look it up. Click again to undo your questionable style choices. No refunds on the petals.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"Shoulder Riding","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\n\nWield ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Cheese","color":"gold"},{"text":". Wave it with intent near your tamed companion. Things might happen. (You can also eat the cheese. It's suspiciously nourishing and slips right down the old gullet, if you can stomach the... moist sounds.)","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"The Hamster Yeetâ„¢","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\n\nFor when words fail and you need a furry, surprisingly aerodynamic solution. Aim (don't stare right at a block), press ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"G","color":"dark_purple"},{"text":" (or your chosen keybind of yeeting). Effective against Creepers. Hamster passes out upon impact. Go console it.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"A Note on Keys","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"

Is ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"G","color":"dark_purple"},{"text":" not throwing your hamster? Did you add this mod to an existing world? Woopsy.

","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Go to: ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Options > Controls > Key Binds","color":"gold"},{"text":".
Find ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":""Throw Hamster,"","color":"gold"},{"text":", and set it to ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"G","color":"dark_purple"},{"text":" (or your preferred key).","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"For The Control Freaks","color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"\n\nNot a fan of earning your hamster's trust for cheek storage? Wish those tooltips would just vanish? Good news for the micromanagers: this mod is highly configurable. Tweak to your heart's content. Or break everything. Your call.","color":"dark_gray"}],"text":""}

{"extra":[{"text":"Misplaced this invaluable tome of rodent wisdom?","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"underlined":true},{"text":"

Shocking. Craft another with a vanilla ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Book","color":"gold"},{"text":" and some ","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"Sliced Cucumber","color":"dark_green"},{"text":". Don't ask why Sliced Cucumber. It's a long story involving a very particular hamster and an unfortunate picnic incident.

","color":"dark_gray"},{"text":"*(No refunds)*","color":"dark_gray","italic":true},{"text":"

Now go forth.","color":"gold"}],"text":""}
